release.action: Add support for additional query "set operators" (EXCEPT, INTERSECT), and add support for mixed usage of said operators.
Add UnaryCondition EXISTS and UNIQUE operators.
Minor cleanups for some of the generic types.
Don't put double parens around IN condition with subexpression.
Handle BigDecimal/BigInteger instances better in NumberValueObject.isFloatingPoint.
Fixed handling of boolean values (handle them as numbers because Sql92 has no notion of a real boolean type), implemented BooleanValueObject.
Added support for view creation (CreateViewQuery) and deletion (DropQuery.Type.VIEW).

Change how state is maintained during query validation. Use the ValidationContext instead of a few collections in order to enable more complicated subquery handling. This change allows subqueries to be validated correctly and opens the door for sub-clause validation.
Fold numeric conversions into normal value conversions.
